scheme_name: Financial Help On Death Of Family Head
details: Financial help on death of family head scheme was launched by Rajasthan state government under tribal area development on 20/08/2008. ₹10,000/- to the wife of the deceased on the premature death of the head of the family of Saharia primitive tribe. Financial assistance is provided so that the family does not face financial burden immediately after the death of the head of the family and his family can be helped.
benefits: Financial Assistance of ₹10,000 to the wife of the deceased head of the family is provided.
eligibility: The person must be from Sahariya Tribe (ST)
application_process: The application form of the scheme can be obtained from and submitted to the Additional Collector and Project Officer, Shahbad.
